content: During the quarter, GMV of Shop Now or Xiaoshigou, the unified brand for all on-demand retail services within the JD ecosystem increased by more than 160 year-over-year, driven by the robust performance of connection through both search results and Nearby tab. In terms of KA or chain merchants' business, in the third quarter, revenue on-demand delivery services to KA merchants increased by more than 40 year-over-year, while gross profit for other continued to improve sequentially. Thank you for your question. Thank you for your question. So definitely, the marketing orders and the take rate increase contribute to the growth of the direct margin, and we expect that for the fourth quarter and also for the next year and the overall marketing revenues still will be growing faster and will contribute to the direct margin and the bottom line improvement a lot. Thank you for your question. Thank you for your question.
